# planetscale_bouncer (Data Source)

Bouncer DataSource

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "planetscale_bouncer" "my_bouncer" {
  branch       = "...my_branch..."
  database     = "...my_database..."
  name         = "...my_name..."
  organization = "...my_organization..."
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `branch` (String) The name of the branch that owns this resource
- `database` (String) The name of the database that owns this resource
- `name` (String) The name of the bouncer
- `organization` (String) The name of the organization that owns this resource

### Read-Only

- `actor` (Attributes) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--actor))
- `branch_data` (Attributes) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--branch_data))
- `created_at` (String) When the bouncer was created
- `deleted_at` (String) When the bouncer was deleted
- `id` (String) The ID of the bouncer
- `parameters` (Attributes List) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--parameters))
- `region_data` (String) Parsed as JSON.
- `replicas_per_cell` (Number) The count of replicas in each cell
- `target` (String) The instance type the bouncer targets
- `updated_at` (String) When the bouncer was updated
